about_the_game:
Try MangaKa Demo and see if it's what you need for your line-art work! If you're not sure your PC can run the software, test it with the demo version!

Features included in the demo version:

  • 6 sample scenes.
  • Included 1 perspective cube and 1 poser FREE
  • All transform tools.
  • All line and shader controls.
  • Rendering up to 5 times screen size
  • All camera filter included.
  • Background music player.
detailed_description:
Try MangaKa Demo and see if it's what you need for your line-art work! If you're not sure your PC can run the software, test it with the demo version!

Features included in the demo version:

  • 6 sample scenes.
  • Included 1 perspective cube and 1 poser FREE
  • All transform tools.
  • All line and shader controls.
  • Rendering up to 5 times screen size
  • All camera filter included.
  • Background music player.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina (Mac OS 10.15)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD® Radeon™ R9 M380 (2GB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Monterey (Mac OS 12)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-7700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD® Radeon™ Pro 580 (8GB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: MangaKa Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-3250 or AMD® FX 8370 (AVX support required)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 660 (2GB) or AMD® R7 370 (2GB) or Intel® HD Graphics 630 or AMD Radeon™ Vega 8
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit or Windows® 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600K or AMD® Ryzen 5 2600X (AVX support required)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 1660 (6GB) or AMD® RX 590 (8GB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Try MangaKa Demo and see if it's what you need for your line-art work! If you're not sure your PC can run the software, test it with the demo version!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Traditional Chinese
